column2: Trupanion, Inc. engages in the provision of medical insurance for cats and dogs. The company is headquartered in Seattle, Washington and currently employs 586 full-time employees. The firm operates in two business segments: subscription business and other business. The subscription business segment includes monthly subscriptions for its medical plan, which are marketed to consumers. The other business segment includes other operations that are not directly marketed to consumers. The firm offers a software solution, Trupanion Express, which is designed to facilitate the direct payment of invoices to veterinary practices. Trupanion Express integrates with veterinarians' practice management software, which allows the Company to access data. The firm's subsidiaries include American Pet Insurance Company, Trupanion Managers USA, Inc., Trupanion Brokers Ontario, Inc. and Wyndham Insurance Company (SAC), Ltd.
